sentences.en: £130 million would be set aside for repairs to schools.
sentences.cn: 将划拨1.3亿英镑用于学校的修缮。

sentences.en: Even newly built houses can need repairs.
sentences.cn: 即使是新建的房子也可能需要维修。

sentences.en: Goldsmith has repaired the roof to ensure the house is windproof.
sentences.cn: 戈德史密斯已经修理了房顶以确保房子可以抵御狂风。

sentences.en: He also repairs clocks and watches.
He quoted a price for the repairs.
sentences.cn: 他给出了维修费用的报价。

sentences.en: I hate having builders botch up repairs on my house.
sentences.cn: 我不愿意让维修工人把我的房子弄得一团糟.

sentences.en: I have had to pay for repairs to the house.
sentences.cn: 我不得不支付房屋维修费用。

sentences.en: Many women know how to carry out repairs on their cars.
sentences.cn: 许多妇女懂得怎样修自己的车。

sentences.en: Many women know how to make repairs on their cars.
sentences.cn: 很多女性知道如何修理汽车。

sentences.en: Repairs and improvements can lead to higher rental rates.
The building needs quite a few repairs.
sentences.cn: 该建筑有好几处应该修缮。

sentences.en: The repairs to the Hafner machine were near to completion.
sentences.cn: 对哈夫纳机器的修理即将结束。

sentences.en: The repairs will cost ￡35, at the very most.
There is a backlog of repairs and maintenance in schools.
sentences.cn: 对各学校的修缮和维护工作积压了一堆。

sentences.en: They lacked the wherewithal to pay for the repairs.
This cream moisturises and repairs in one.
sentences.cn: 这种护肤霜兼具滋润和修复功能。

sentences.en: Work went on as usual inside, uninterrupted by outside repairs.
sentences.cn: 外部装修,内部照常营业.

words.tran_cn: [会计]修理；恢复（repair的三单形式）；弥补；纠正

phrases.tran_cn: 重复工具包；维修工具；工作服

trans.tran_cn: 修理，修补( repair的名词复数 )，修补的地方
trans.tran_en: A repair is something that you do to mend a machine, building, piece of clothing, or other thing that has been damaged or is not working properly

trans.tran_cn: 纠正( repair的第三人称单数 )，补救
trans.tran_en: If you repair something that has been damaged or is not working properly, you fix it
